configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Callback Notification Signature Key
configuration.description: A key used to generate a validation hash header of the event/bulk notification webhook callback payload

resources.description: Upload a photo. See additional documentation here: https://developer.bazaarvoice.com/apis/conversations/tutorials/photo_upload#image-url

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The Content type of the photo being uploaded. Can be 'Review', 'Question', or 'Answer'

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The photo to be uploaded. Can support .png .bmp .gif .jpg

parameters.name: multipart/form-data
parameters.description: The content type for file upload

parameters.name: photoUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the photo to be uploaded

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action: preview or submit

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The review

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The product ID

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The Bazaarvoice filter. For example: rating:gt:3

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number. Defaults to 1 if not provided

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 5000

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. For example: rating > 3

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The Bazaarvoice filter. For example: rating:gt:3

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number. Defaults to 1 if not provided

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 5000

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. For example: rating > 3

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The feedback

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The comment ID

parameters.name: review_comment
parameters.description: The content type

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action: preview or submit

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The comment

parameters.name: reviewId
parameters.description: The review ID

parameters.description: The feedback

parameters.name: review
parameters.description: The content type

parameters.description: The review ID
